name: Up&Net
overview:
Up&Net enables any e-merchant to accept automatically and instantly any private payment. Up&Net creates innovative features backed with private ePayment programs.

UP&NET PROCESSES 4 MAIN KINDS OF SERVICES • Service 1 : E-Giftcard program (universal or thematic). E-Giftcard are accepted by e-merchants. E-Giftcards are sent by email or can be printed. They are re-materialized for distribution in convenience store.

• Service 2 : Payment services programs for professionals. This service is a low cost alternative to MCO (payment card) or debit card. A payment account is provided to them for purchasing products and services in limited acceptance network. Customers earns points for each payment. A «points re-deeming» program is then established.

• Service 3 : A loyalty program feed a payment account. The loyalty program is not determined by the use of a payment service. It rewards the customer’s loyalty to a given brand name only.

• Service 4 : An immediate rebate program. Customers order 100 and pay 95. The 5 basic points rebate are in fact taken in charge by the e-merchant (affiliate commission) 15 days after the transaction. This advance must be financed by Up&Net when the customer perform the transaction
